title: ‘It’s a Unique and Lucky Position That I Am in:’ Unbound Winner Lachlan Morton Extends Contract
content:
Australian inks new deal with EF Pro Cycling, has more unusual projects on the cards: ‘It gives me that freedom to do the things I care about.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Unique and Lucky Position That I Am in:’ Unbound Winner Lachlan Morton Extends Contract on Velo.
author: sstokes
